<abstract>
 <para>This chapter describes configurations used in Content. It consists of the following main sections:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Components">Component</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of the services which provide low-level functionality for UI components.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Configuration.Plugins">External Component Plugins</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of the main external component plugins used in the Content function. Each part supplies an example configuration
           with the explanation about ini-params so you can know how to use these plugins.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.CMIS.Configuration">CMIS configuration</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of CMIS configuration and other additional information. </para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
	</abstract>
